sentences.sContent: Why do scientists think something could be hidden beyond the edge of our solar system?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why do scientists think something could be hidden beyond the edge of our solar system?
sentences.sCn: 为什么科学家认为可能有某种东西潜藏在太阳系的边缘？

trans.tranOther: the Sun and the  planets  that go around it
